vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Hachmon or Tahchemon(?), only mentioned at 2Sa.23.8; also called Tahchemonite (KJV: Tachmonite; NIV: Tahkemonite) at 2Sa.23.8;
Group of chakh.mo.ni (חַכְמוֹנִי "Hachmonite" H2453)
§ Tachmonite = "thou will make me wise"
descriptive designation of Josheb-basshebeth, one of David's mighty warriors
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
他革捫人 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "你將使我有智慧"
用來指大衛的大能勇士約設巴設(撒下 23:8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
他革扪人 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "你将使我有智慧"
用来指大卫的大能勇士约设巴设(撒下 23:8)
